CustomField.description: This field will be used for Expere Doc Prep, which has not yet been implemented. This field is not required. If enabled, there is a limit to the amount that a variable rate can change over successive specified periods. If disabled, this field is not used. By default, it is disabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true there is a limit to the amount that a variable rate can change over successive specified periods.
CustomField.label: Periodic Change Limit Indicator
